channel.title: Posts on Riptide Rhythm
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Riptide Rhythm

item.title: Walrus Lillian
item.description: The Lillian is an analog, multi-stage phaser that from it’s sister pedal, the Julia where you can blend between Dry, Phase Shifted, and Vibrato.

item.title: EVH 5150
item.description: I am a person to steer away from signature amps because I don’t want to sound like someone else but the 5150 is really not a signature anymore.

item.title: Boss GT-1000
item.description: This is out of the norm for me. I prefer tubes and boxes because of their ease of use.

item.title: Horizon Devices Precision Drive
item.description: No one paid me for this. Honest opinions. Overview Misha Mansoor’s Horizon Devices released their first product a while back called the Precision Drive but people keep asking me for my opinion since I own one.

item.title: DIY Les Paul (finishing)
item.description: Blue Finish No Lacquer Finish Lacquered Unbuffed Finish After the first telecaster kit, I wanted to do a full kit without a pre-finished body.

item.title: DIY Guitar Kit
item.description: So I decided it was time. I am tired of buying guitars that aren’t exactly what I want.

item.title: Pedalboards
item.description: When starting out with pedals, the hardest thing to do is decide what kind of pedalboard you should get.

item.title: Know thy Power
item.description: These are the most common questions that I get asked when people first get started.

item.title: Earthquaker Devices Space Spiral
item.description: Earthquaker Devices, or EQD has always been a pedal company that drastically changes your tone.

item.title: Walrus Audio Red High-Gain Distortion
item.description: I have not been paid for this review. Overview Walrus Audio unveiled at NAMM ‘17 their new distortion, “Red”.
